title: Test
summary: This grouped bar chart has 3 categories of Company on the x axis representing 3 groups: 2017, 2018, and 2019.
Averaging these 3 groups, the highest category is found for Company Innovative Medicines with a mean value of 7.82.
The lowest category is observed at Alcon that has a mean value of 0.39
showing a difference of 181.0% with the maximum value.

In case of Innovative Medicines, 2017 shows more dominance than any other Company and it has the lowest value in Alcon. On the other hand, group 2019 is highest in case of Innovative Medicines and has minimum impact for Company Alcon.
